price: at ng sinumang nasa lupa nang lahatan, pagkatapos makapagliligtas ito sa kanya.
arabic: وَمَن فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ جَمِيعٗا ثُمَّ يُنجِيهِ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waman fī al-arḍi jamīʿan thumma yunjīhi
